item.title: Domain 'ImprovingApp' Message Summary
item.author: somebody@somewere.tld (Not Provided)
item.description: Name Users Description Command ‘ActivateMember’ No description provided. Command ‘ActivateMember’ MemberCommand, On command ImprovingApp.MemberContext.ActivateMember, On command ImprovingApp.MemberContext.ActivateMember Update state of member to Active Command ‘ActivateOrganization’ OrganizationCommand, On command ActivateOrganization, On command ActivateOrganization No description provided. Command ‘ActivateProduct’ ProductCommand, On command ActivateProduct, On command ProductContext.ActivateProduct, On command ProductContext.ActivateProduct, On command ProductContext.ActivateProduct No description provided. Command ‘ActivateTenant’ TenantCommand, On command ActivateTenant A command that activates a tenant so that operations can be allowed Command ‘AddLiveUpdate’ EventCommand, On command AddLiveUpdate, On command AddLiveUpdate, On command AddLiveUpdate, On command AddLiveUpdate No description provided.
